description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the vulnerabilities in Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) build 120.0.2210.133:

1. Ensure that your Microsoft Edge installation is at least version 120.0.2210.133 or higher.
2. Regularly check for updates using the built-in Microsoft Edge update feature or visit the official Microsoft Edge update page.

**Details**:
- This update mitigates certain issues that could affect the security and functionality of the browser.
- For more information, view the update on the Microsoft website: [MSRC CVE-2024-0333](https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2024-0333).

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure administrative privileges are available for system updates.
- Backup critical user data before performing updates to prevent data loss.
